name: M-M-Monster
description: A game made of Ludum Dare 33 with the theme You are the Monster. An Incredibly short game drawn up and coded in less than a day due to being busy for the rest of the jam. Technically this is also the first game I've ever 100% completed and not given up on part way through I would really like any Feedback. It was made using Unity Personal and MS Paint with Gimp being used for transparency.
